00054 #include "nut_io.h"
00055 
00056 #include <string.h>
00057 #include <io.h>
00058 
00059 #include <sys/heap.h>
00060 
00065 
00066 static int _sgetb(int fd, void *buffer, size_t count)
00067 {
00068     char **spp = (char **) ((uintptr_t) fd);
00069     char  *dst = (char*) buffer;
00070     size_t result = 0;
00071     
00072     while( count > 0 && **spp != 0) {
00073         *dst++ = *(*spp)++;  // increment not spp but *spp
00074         count--;
00075         result++;
00076     }
00077     
00078     return result;
00079 }
00080 
00097 int vsscanf_P(CONST char *string, PGM_P fmt, va_list ap)
00098 {
00099     CONST char *ptr = string;
00100     int rc;
00101     char *rp;
00102     size_t rl;
00103 
00104     rl = strlen_P(fmt) + 1;
00105     if ((rp = NutHeapAlloc(rl)) == 0)
00106         return -1;
00107     memcpy_P(rp, fmt, rl);
00108     rc = _getf(_sgetb, (int) ((uintptr_t) &ptr), rp, ap);
00109     NutHeapFree(rp);
00110 
00111     return rc;
00112 }
